FuncDef: This command configures the mapping of FCs to up to six forwarding sets for the class-based forwarding (CBF) of an LDP FEC or a BGP prefix over IGP shortcuts.
CLIs: fc { be | l2 | af | l1 | h2 | ef | h1 | nc } forwarding-set <set-id>
no { be | l2 | af | l1 | h2 | ef | h1 | nc }

ParaDef.Parameters: {be | l2 | af | l1 | h2 | ef | h1 | nc}
ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the forwarding class.
Specifies the class forwarding set. Values-1 to 4 (in system profile None/A).
